Name: Polytetrafluoroethylene

Name: Hydrogen
Description: The lightest and most abundant chemical element in the universe.

Name: Nitrogen
Description: Makes up 78% of the Earth's atmosphere and is used in the production of ammonia.

Name: Toluene

Name: Propane
Description: Used as a fuel for heating, cooking and in engines.

Name: Ethanol
Description: Commonly known as alcohol, used in beverages and as a fuel.

Name: Formaldehyde

Name: Xylene

Name: Nitric Acid

Name: Sodium Hydroxide
Description: A strong base used in soap making and chemical manufacturing.

Name: Perchloroethylene
